unfortunate.translation[0].definitions[0: someone who is unfortunate has something bad happen to them
When we entered the room, the teacher was yelling at some unfortunate student.
unfortunate.translation[0].definitions[1: an unfortunate situation, condition, quality etc is one that you wish was different
He has an unfortunate habit of repeating himself.
It’s most unfortunate  (=very unfortunate) that your father can’t come to the wedding.
It’s unfortunate that so few people seem willing to help.
unfortunate.translation[0].definitions[3: unfortunate behaviour, remarks etc make people feel embarrassed or offended
unfortunate.translation[1].definitions[0: someone who has no money, home, job etc
